channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The stock market’s ‘fear gauge’ spiked to its highest level since Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ tariffs caused a global selloff
item.description: Tech valuations, interest rates, and geopolitical risks are creating a "perfect storm" of uncertainty.

item.title: We Asked Roblox’s C.E.O. About Child Safety. It Got Tense.
item.description: This week the company announced that it would require users to undergo an A.I.-powered age estimation process in order to chat with others on the plat...

item.title: European Leaders Back Zelensky After Trump’s Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan Excludes Them
item.description: The 28-point proposal would require Kyiv to surrender territory and reduce the size of its army. If Moscow complies with the terms, it could receive b...

item.title: Nvidia CEO says AI will actually make everyone a lot busier: ‘Everybody’s jobs will be different’
item.description: “I would say that there's every evidence that we will be more productive and yet still be busier because we have so many ideas,” Jensen Huang said.

item.title: How Principal Financial’s new CEO brought AI religion to the C-suite, and then worked to upskill 20,000 employees
item.description: Principal Financial CEO Deanna Strable has made AI literacy a key focus across all levels of the company.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’ most expensive investment is a $500 million custom superyacht that’s the largest in the world
item.description: The Amazon founder even paid an extra $75 million for another yacht to support his superyacht.

item.title: France to probe Elon Musk’s Grok after it said Holocaust gas chambers were used for ‘disinfection’ against ‘typhus’ rather than murder
item.description: Earlier this year, Musk’s company took down posts from the chatbot that appeared to praise Adolf Hitler after complaints about antisemitic content.

item.title: Roblox Rolls Out Face Scans for Age Verification: What to Know
item.description: The popular gaming platform said the tool was designed to stop children from chatting with older users they didn’t know.

item.title: Top Fed Official Boosts Odds of a December Rate Cut
item.description: John C. Williams, president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, said the central bank had scope to lower borrowing costs ‘in the near term.’

item.title: U.S. Ambassador to Canada Channels Harsh Trump Tone
item.description: Pete Hoekstra’s bluntness is seen as undiplomatic by Canadian officials and interpreted as a way for the Trump administration to turn up the heat as t...

item.title: Japan’s New Leader Mentions Taiwan, and Tanks Her Relationship With China
item.description: Facing reprisals from Beijing for a remark over Taiwan, Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi must walk a fine line to prevent escalating the dispute without ...

item.title: Anxiety Over A.I. Spending Looms Over Markets
item.description: After a brief rally fueled by Nvidia’s strong earnings, investors’ fears of an A.I. bubble returned, driving broad market swings.

item.title: European Leaders Back Zelensky After Trump’s Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan Excludes Them

item.title: Roblox Rolls Out Face Scans for Age Verification: What to Know
item.description: The popular gaming platform said the tool was designed to stop children from chatting with older users they didn’t know.

item.title: Satellite Data Reveals How the U.S. Navy Is Deployed Near Venezuela
item.description: The Times identified nearly 100 locations traversed by naval vessels across a two-and-a-half-month period to determine what the military pressure camp...
